title: Phillips curve - gov't spending, inf. exp. effects

content.description:
In answering the question, you should emphasize the line of reasoning that generated your results; it is not enough to list the results of your analysis. Include correctly labeled diagrams, if useful or required, in explaining your answers. A correctly labeled diagram must have all axes and curves clearly labeled and must show directional changes.

Draw a correctly labeled graph showing the short-run and long-run Phillips curves for Country X.

Identify how each of the following affects inflation, unemployment, and the short-run Phillips curve.

An increase in government spending

A drop in inflationary expectations

Identify the effect of increased unemployment-insurance benefits on the long-run Phillips curve.
